Name: Mystique
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Rust coloured and fruit charged. Not the sweetie you might expect.
History: Created in 2002 by Tim Halilaj, Albania.
Nutrition: One serving of Mystique contains 317 calories
